plot: College initiation rites on one Belgian campus end in tragic death of one freshman. His friends are determined to see the justice done.
title: Ad Fundum
plot_es: College initiation rites on one Belgian campus end in tragic death of one freshman. His friends are determined to see the justice done.
plot_en: College initiation rites on one Belgian campus end in tragic death of one freshman. His friends are determined to see the justice done.
